name: RapidAir Tubing Clamp 12-Pack - 1/2 in. OD Compatibility
description: The Rapidair 3/8 in. Plastic Tubing Clamp (12-Pack) is designed to mount 1/2 in. OD tubing. Use for surface mounted tubing. Single mounting screw hole allows for fast installation time.Nylon material for long lasting strengthBlack colorCompatible with 1/2 in. OD tubingRecommended clamp spacing is 16 in.
